about_the_game:
A mysterious force binds you to an unyielding rule: stopping means certain death. In Don't Stop You'll Die!, you must navigate through the seven circles of hell, facing relentless waves of enemies. Arm yourself with a powerful arsenal of weapons and abilities. Survival hinges on quick reflexes, constant movement, and split-second decisions. Can you escape this unforgiving gauntlet, or will you succumb to the chaos?

Key Features

  • Fast-Paced Roguelike Action: Constant movement is essential—stopping means instant death!

  • Dynamic Wave-Based Combat: Face relentless waves of enemies, with difficulty ramping up as you progress.

  • Diverse Arsenal: Wield a variety of weapons and abilities, from guns to supernatural powers, to crush your foes.

  • Procedurally Generated Challenges: Experience a fresh and unpredictable run every time you play.

  • Replayability: With its roguelike design, no two runs are ever the same—offering endless hours of gameplay.

  • Quirky NPCs: Interact with eccentric characters like Gort and Mort, who add charm and depth to the underworld.

name: DON'T STOP, YOU'LL DIE!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Don't Stop, You'll Die! is a fast-paced roguelike where stopping means certain death. Navigate through the seven circles of hell, using a variety of weapons, items and abilities. Quick thinking and constant movement are key to survival in this action-packed challenge. How long can you last?
